attributes.action: Stop all Translation Services in UK
attributes.additional_details:
Stop all translation services being paid for by the tax payer and insist that all non english speaking persons obtain their own if needed.
Stop wasting money printing leaflets and signs in multiple languages.
If you live in the UK then, as per the grounds for obtaining citizenship, you must be able to understand English, both written and spoken.
This would not apply to the indiginous languages of the UK ie Welsh and Gaelic.
